comment: Given a sigma-measurable function, the preimage of a Borel set belongs to the subspace sigma-algebra induced by the domain of the function. Proposition 121E (f) of [Fremlin1] p. 37 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
